listing.listing_description: Wake up early to find the perfect sunrise-vantage-point on the wrap-around balcony and lose yourself in panoramic ocean views at this luxurious Cabo casita. Pop back-and-forth between the pool and hot tub to strike a balance, do some grilling on the barbecue, and then head inside to catch the big game. Later, hop in a golf cart and explore the resort before you venture on to Cabo San Lucas. Spanish colonial architecture mixes with modern decor at this breezy seaside home. Gather the family for popcorn and movie; stretching out on the L-shaped sofa. Get creative in the stylish kitchen by trying your hand at local cuisine. After, mix up a cocktail or two, light up the fireplace and settle into the patio lounge for an incredible night under the stars with good friends. Casita 42 comes with daily housekeeping, a butler, and an on-site concierge, as well as a parking space within the gated community. Drop the kids off at Palmilla Kids Camp and keep up with your fitness routine at the gym or Club Espiritu’s pilates studio. Don’t feel like cooking? Bring in a private chef, have dinner at the Palmilla Resort’s restaurant or the poolside grill at Club Ninety-Six. Golfers are in good hands on the Cabo coast, right next door to Del Mar you’ll find one of Golf Magazine’s favorite’s, the Jack Nicklaus’ signature course at Palmilla. After a beer in the clubhouse, head to Palmilla Beach to cool off in the ocean. Then, set out for an exciting night of bar hopping, delicious seafood, and dancing down the coast in Cabo San Lucas. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Baan Ora Chorn is a beautiful villa perched along Lipa Noi Beach on the west coast of Koh Samui. The villa's exquisite design brings together traditional Southeast Asian elements with a modern sensibility and high-end comforts, harmonizing with its stunning natural surroundings. Ample outdoor spaces include a pool terrace, multiple ocean-view balconies, and a beachfront alfresco dining pavilion, while the villa's extraordinary staff includes a resident villa manager and personal Thai chef. Ideal for families or destination wedding guests, the villa features five superb bedrooms including a kid-friendly bunk room.The superbly landscaped estate centers around an ample, gem-toned swimming pool nestled amid lithe palm trees and vibrant potted plants. A lush lawn extends from the pool to the beach's soft white sands, with sun loungers oriented toward the vast panorama. The poolside sala features a bar, outdoor kitchen, and lovely wood dining table with expansive ocean views.The villa's primary living area is the great room on the upper floor of the main pavilion. It features vaulted ceilings, sweeping views of the pool and ocean, cathedral windows, a dining table, and an adjacent chef's kitchen with breakfast bar. The décor is under-stated yet exquisite, with fine touches of Buddhist artwork and natural materials evoking a timeless Southeast Asian serenity. On the opposite side of this pavilion, a stairwell leads down into an oasis-like garden.The villa features four bedrooms with double beds, as well as a bunkroom for one adult or two children. Each of the bedrooms enjoys an ensuite bathroom, and three include alfresco bathtubs on terraces with enchanting views.A destination unto itself, Baan Ora Chorn is also a wonderful base for exploring Koh Samui. The town of Nathon is about ten miles away, where you can catch a boat for a daytrip to the outer islands, including Angthong National Marine Park. The inland forests include the Buddhist sites at Wat Kiri Wongkaram, Wat Sila Ngu, and Secret Budda Garden. Golfers are about forty minutes from the famed Santiburi Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The turquoise pool seems to spill into the jewel-toned sea from this contemporary villa on the shores of Koh Samui. One of the only private homes amid luxury boutique hotels, it has eclectic pieces that feel like a well-traveled friend’s. Sip drinks while watching the sunset, from the rooftop or only a few steps away from honeymoon-favorite Bophut Beach, and shop and snack at the Friday-night market in Fisherman’s Village. Listen to the waves lap at the shore from the loungers around the infinity pool, and heat up the barbecue for dinner at the alfresco table as the sky turns brilliant shades of pink, orange, and purple at sunset. The beachfront location means you need only cross a palm-dotted lawn to put your toes in the sand. Open the doors fronting this vacation rental to let the breeze waft over an all-white sitting area, glass-topped dining table for 6, and a sleek, fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, whose turquoise tiles match the water outside. The villa’s 5 bedrooms are their own airy retreats; one even has its own terrace and plunge pool overlooking the ocean. A holiday at the villa puts you on Bophut Beach, a family-friendly stretch where you can play in the water, taste Thailand in street-food stalls or gourmet restaurants, and finish the day with a casual beer or a breathtaking fire show. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.See Koh Samui from a property unlike any other at Villa ONE. Whether you’re taking a honeymoon-style getaway with your one and only or a tropical holiday with friends and family, this spectacular vacation rental delivers chic accommodations, stunning views over Chaweng Bay and a location close to beaches and Bophut. Its attentive staff and five bedrooms are ready to pamper parties of up to ten guests.Your stay at this luxury property begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a villa manager, chef and two full-time staff members. After the daily breakfast, put a playlist on the outdoor sound system and stretch out in a lounger by the infinity pool, keep up with your routine in the exercise room or challenge everyone at the pool table. There’s also a home theater, Apple TV, indoor sound system and even a piano.Sliding glass walls mean the views are just as incredible from the indoor living spaces as from the outdoor ones. A water feature, polished stone floors and sleek furnishings lend a cool, contemporary vibe to the open-concept living and dining areas. Though chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.All five bedrooms at Villa ONE have king beds, private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans. The master suite also has its own jetted tub, lounge area and furnished terrace, and several other bedrooms open to balconies.Villa ONE is just a short drive from the popular beaches at Chaweng and Bophut, putting you within easy reach of the island’s famously beautiful waters and lively beachfront bars, perfect for whiling away an afternoon. It’s also a short drive from the nearest grocery store in Chaweng, plus more shopping and dining options in downtown Bophut.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tidepools form and are washed away on the beach out front, but the swimming pool is always waiting at this airy contemporary villa in Bophut. The house is designed for indoor-outdoor living, with the pool terrace on the sea and a private courtyard separating its two air-conditioned pavilions. It’s 10 minutes or less to the beach, weekend market, and ferry connections in Nathon.Listen to the water lap at the shore while splashing in the infinity pool, lying in the hammock, or trying out local produce on the gas barbecue. Find your flow inside in the dedicated yoga space. A partial staff of villa manager and housekeeper will oversee airport transfers and laundry service during your holiday.Step through a slide-away glass wall from the waterfront terrace to an open-concept great room, whose two-story windows frame sea views to the horizon. Spread out on the sectional and around the live-edge dining table for 8. Kids can play on the mezzanine level while grown-ups prep a family dinner in the fully equipped kitchen.This vacation rental is a few minutes’ drive from Nathon, the main port on Koh Samui and a great place to glimpse authentic Thailand life. Join locals and backpackers alike on the weekend walking street night market and watch fishing boats in the bay. It’s also 10 minutes or less by car to 3 different beaches, and close enough to top-rated Bophut Beach to spend the day there.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: It doesn’t get any better than true-beachfront, especially along the sandy and secluded shores of Laem Sor Bay, Thailand. From the sea to the pool, to the living room couch, barrier-free, in a matter of seconds, that’s how the open-air Villa Suma celebrates Koh Samui’s beautiful beach environment. With six en-suite king bedrooms, all with an ocean view, this balmy beach house is perfect for a family getaway or vacation with friends. There is also a seventh bedroom that is great for kids. And nearby, you’ll find golf, rainforest, and shopping, restaurants, and nightlife seven miles away on Main Street.With the smoothest transition imaginable, Villa Suma’s open concept interior spills out to the beachfront terrace, creating the perfect setting for a relaxing beach vacation. Inside, white walls act as a canvas for rich wood tones and ocean-inspired turquoise accent pieces. The kitchen, dining area, and lounge, adorned with designer furniture and high-end electronics, blend into a spacious great room, ideal for social occasions and group gatherings.Villa Suma’s beachfront estate is decorated with sun loungers, a hammock, outdoor living and dining areas, a refreshing infinity swimming pool, and lush tropical greenery. To make your stay even more relaxing, Suma comes with housekeeping, airport transfer, and a private chef. And, inside, features like Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and formal dining for ten make sure your stay is cool and comfortable.Finding the beach couldn’t be easier at Villa Suma, but if you’d like to visit a more populated stretch of sand, Nikki and Lamai beaches are both favorites among locals and return visitors, and they’re just a few minutes from home. If there’s a golfer in your group, Royal Samui Golf Club is a scenic nine-hole that runs along the coast for spectacular ocean views and challenging fairways. And, if you’d like to learn about Thailand's local flora and fauna, Na Muang Safari Park is perfect for an afternoon excursion.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The largest of three magnificent villas that make up the Sangsuri Estate on Koh Samui, Villa 1 is an expansive, seven bedroom property built over a series of landscaped terraces that step down to an undisturbed stretch of beach just north of Chaweng. With its dramatic sloping cliff side location, the architect creates a supremely comfortable and luxurious tropical retreat that is essentially a private resort, perfect for groups or families. Your dream villa awaits!Villa Sangsuri 1 is an extravagant villa hidden away in a stunning, peaceful beachside location. Guests can enjoy every possible private amenity and intelligent designs mean large groups have an appealing blend of communal and private spaces to explore. A high wall at one end features a built-in projector screen so the garden can be transformed into an outdoor cinema. Days turn into nights while lazing by the pool or on the beach, the day punctuated by alfresco meals prepared to order by the villa’s private chef.The villa’s chic, contemporary design scheme is nicely balanced against a more rustic feeling that includes thatched-roof bedroom pavilions and shuttered bathrooms. A harmonious balance is easily achieved between indoor and outdoor living as you wander between the various spaces that make up this expansive residence. The generous, furnished, open plan lounge and dining space folds open onto a fabulous pool and steps lead down to the soft Samui sand.The villa’s multiple levels house comfortable bedroom pavilions with private sky gardens and sun terraces, all of which draw in calming views of the ocean and a picturesque, uninhabited island known as Koh Matlang. The upper floor is home to a spacious and colorful children’s dorm with comfortable, contemporary bunk beds. With a total of seven bedrooms, this villa can accommodate up to twelve adults and eight children.Villa 1 at Sangsuri Estate is perfect for weddings, anniversary gatherings, parties or just as the ideal place to spend quality time with friends or family in the comfort of a superlative beachfront villa. The sheer lavish quality and exquisite design have made this luxury villa one of the island’s top choices for family holiday villas and professional retreats alike. Let you and your entourage be serenaded by the sound of the gentle sea at Sangsuri Estate and emerge refreshed and rejuvenated like never before.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa 3 at Sangsuri Estate occupies a peaceful tropical cliff side that steps gently down to an undisturbed beach just a short drive north of Koh Samui’s main tourist town, Chaweng. This stunning, five bedroom villa is designed as a series of luxurious living and sleeping pavilions, set on four levels, and connected by stepped pathways spread through attractive, landscaped grounds. The property overlooks a meditative bay that is home to the postcard-perfect offshore island of Matlang.Villa Sangsuri 3 features an appealing choice of private and communal spaces. The lower level beachside spa is an indulgent inclusion, even for a luxury villa of this size, and the addition of a private cinema room behind the lounge adds yet more appeal to the wide-ranging facilities. The dining pavilion sits to the left of the garden and boasts an eight-seat dining table and breakfast bar, served by a fully equipped resort-style kitchen to the rear.An arched entrance leads directly down to a wide, landscaped garden adorned with flowering plants, mature trees and huge Balinese rocks filled with water lilies. A furnished relaxation sala is also perched poolside for shaded repose, complete with a giant mirror to reflect the breathtaking natural surroundings. The lounge sits to the right of this area, folding wood and glass doors on three sides to draw in the views and warm sea breezes. Hidden behind the lounge is the cinema room with pull down cinema screen and full digital entertainment system.With a total of seven bedrooms, this villa can accommodate up to fourteen guests. The master suite boasts walk-in closet, high ceilings, wood and glass doors that open onto the pool and automated blinds on three sides for added privacy. In addition to the poolside terrace, the room also opens onto its own private balcony overlooking the beach and sea.Despite being one of the only luxury villa estates on Koh Samui within easy reach of the many shops and nightlife options in Chaweng, Sangsuri Villa 3 enjoys one of the most secluded and peaceful locations on the island. The sheer size of the property and generous amount of private space available to guests makes this one of the most attractive choices on the island for a private wedding, group celebration or corporate retreat. Your dream villa awaits!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take a blissful break from real life at The Headland Villa 4. Part of the exclusive Headland near Baan Taling Ngam, this airy Koh Samui vacation rental is set on one of the island’s quieter coasts—yet still close to picturesque beaches and lively towns. Reserve its two bedrooms for a getaway with close family only or a tropical honeymoon, or book with one of the other villas for a holiday with a larger group.Your stay at The Headland Villa 4 includes daily continental breakfast, as well as the services of a concierge, villa manager and housekeeper. Take in views of the island’s more secluded side and the azure sea from outdoor living areas with a lap pool and lounging and dining furniture. After sunset, pour a glass from the in-villa wine selection and settle in by the satellite television or Wi-Fi.The villa is designed to be both charming and practical, with a traditional thatched roof and modern fold-away glass walls. An open-plan great room with living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen looks out over the pool terrace to the sea. The mezzanine level over the great room is the ideal spot for kids to watch television or for grown-ups to spend a quiet moment reading.This luxury property has one bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with two twin beds; both have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Like the great room, the bedrooms feature contemporary furnishings and fold-away glass walls for a look that’s both breezy and sophisticated.The Headland Villa 4 is just a short walk from a rocky beach and a short drive from the sandy, swimmable Lamai Beach. It’s also close to Baan Sabai Resort and Spa, the ferry port and the famed Five Islands restaurant. Don’t miss the chance to explore the bustling town of Nathon, a 11 km drive from the villa, where you’ll find shops selling local products and eateries dishing out local specialties.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Note: This villa can be rented in conjunction with other villas

listing.listing_description: Savor stunning views from sunrise to sunset from gorgeous Villa Ella. Perched in the quiet hills overlooking Chaweng Bay, this beautifully designed Koh Samui vacation rental commands vistas of brilliant blue ocean—and offers a location close to beaches, shopping and dining. Its four bedrooms and attentive staff means you can invite up to eight friends or family members for a pampering tropical holiday.Your stay at Villa Ella begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a villa manager, chef and two full-time staff. Take in the views from expansive outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, plenty of loungers, a barbecue and a hot tub. After sunset, flip on the smart TV and Bluetooth sound system or share photos of your day via Wi-Fi.Of course, it’s also easy to enjoy the views from the villa’s double-height great room, which is fronted by a wall of glass. Stretch out in the sitting areas on the first floor or climb the staircase to the dining area on the second level. Though chef service is included in your stay, there’s also a sleek fully equipped kitchen near the dining table.All four bedrooms at this luxury property are honeymoon-suite-inspired retreats with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans; two of the bedrooms also open to private balconies. The glass-walled bathrooms mean you can even look out over the ocean while you’re in the bathtub.Villa Ella is a short drive from the popular beaches at Chaweng, Bophut and Maenam, where you can play in the water or while away the afternoon at a laid-back oceanfront bar. It’s also a short drive from downtown Chaweng and shopping and dining in downtown Bophut. Avid players won’t want to miss the chance to play a round at nearby Santiburi Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy all that Phuket has to offer at Baan Laemson 1. Beautifully designed and centrally located, this Kamala vacation rental is the perfect place to while away a sunny day by the pool, or an ideal base for exploring the nearby beaches, including two 2 private beaches, as well as golf courses and other attractions. An attentive staff, luxury amenities and six suite-style bedrooms will ensure the comfort of up to ten friends or family members.During your holiday, the villa manager, cook and housekeeper will attend to your needs. Spend the days sunbathing on the loungers by the infinity pool, trying out local fare from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining area, and the nights watching the stars come out from the rooftop terrace or watching a favorite movie in the indoor entertainment area.Designed by an architect who’s worked with the exclusive Aman Resorts Group, Baan Laemson 1 puts a chic modern twist on traditional Thai style. Beneath the villa’s sloping roofs, you’ll find open-plan living spaces with walls of windows framing the views of Kamala Bay and the Andaman Sea. Multiple conversation areas let one group chat while another watches TV, and the formal dining area has room for twelve. There’s even more seating at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, too.Each of the property’s six bedrooms feels like a private hotel suite, with a double bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and balcony with ocean views. Like the common living areas, the bedrooms’ wood floors and white walls serve as the backdrop for sculptural accent furnishings and unique works of art.A stone pathway leads from Baan Laemson 1 to a private beach, putting Phuket’s famed turquoise waters within easy reach. It’s just a short drive from the villa to lively Patong beach, the tempting shopping in Phuket Town, and popular Surin Beach, where you can have a casual drink or splurge on a honeymoon-worthy dinner along the oceanfront promenade.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Follow the sun on a beach holiday at Baan Tawantok Villa 1. Set on the picture-perfect shores of Lipa Noi Beach, this Koh Samui vacation rental will tempt you to spend days by the water and evenings watching the sunset over the sea. A full staff and five bedrooms can accommodate up to ten guests in tropical luxury.Your stay at the villa begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a chef, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as continental breakfast each day. Make the most of the warm weather and gorgeous setting in outdoor living areas with space for lounging and dining, a barbecue and an oceanfront pool, plus a shared tennis court. In the evenings, unwind in front of the satellite television or share photos with friends and family back home via Wi-Fi.The villa’s bright, breezy interiors feature an open-concept layout and high ceilings. It’s easy to gather everyone in the living and dining areas in the great room, and a fully equipped kitchen makes meal preparation a snap. Open the sliding glass doors to let in the sea breezes, or close them on the hottest days and flip on the air conditioning instead.Relive your honeymoon in the incredible master suite at Baan Tawantok Villa 1, which has a king bed, lounge area and ocean views. There are three other bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds; all five have private en-suite bathrooms and outdoor showers. For larger parties, there is a mezzanine area in the master bedroom with an additional queen bed.Having tranquil Lipa Noi Beach just in front of the villa means it couldn’t be simpler to spend a day on the sand. For a great brunch or a fun night out, you can also make the short drive to Nikki Beach. Sample more dining options or shop for unique souvenirs in downtown Nathon, just a bit farther down the coast.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With six luxuriously adorned bedrooms spread out along its lush estate, this beachfront villa acts more like a boutique resort, but Thansamaay is just for you. Located on the south-facing shores of Coco Beach on Thailand’s Island, Koh Samui, Villa Thansamaay is the perfect setting for a family vacation, wedding ceremony, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style. Within walking distance, you’ll find beachfront bars and restaurants, shops, and a yoga retreat. And, within a few miles, you’ll have access to the rainforest, golf, nightlife, and several more beach areas.Each bedroom and common space at Villa Thansamaay features access to the terrace. And, with its compound-style layout, the open-air beach atmosphere is taken to a new level. You’ll love the seamless transitions between inside and out, and all of the different lounge areas throughout the property. Inside, designer furniture, high-end electronics, and contemporary pieces of art are thoughtfully arranged to promote a social, yet relaxing atmosphere.Thansamaay’s vibrant estate is perfect for capturing sunrise and sunset views over the endless blue ocean. From the many outdoor living areas, sun loungers, swimming pool, and alfresco dining set, you’ll have an ever-present vista of the ocean and private beachfront. Inside, formal dining, a fully equipped kitchen, an espresso machine, and a wine fridge make meal prep a breeze. And, Wi-Fi, television, and air conditioning will make sure guests are cool and connected.Just beyond the terrace, you’ll enjoy your own twenty-seven meter stretch of pristine sand and calm, clear waters on Coco Beach. If you’d like to explore some of Koh Samui’s more populated beach areas, Nikki and Lamai beaches are favorites among locals and visitors, with plenty to see and do on and around the beach. If there’s a golfer in your entourage, Royal Samui Golf Club is a challenging nine-hole course with fairways that wind along the coast for incredible ocean views. And, for more shopping, dining, and nightlife options, drive seven miles to Main Street.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Listen to the waves lapping at the shores of Koh Samui from your own sleek private residence at Baan Hinyai. This incredible contemporary vacation rental just outside the town of Lamai offers direct access to the beach and expansive views over the sea. Its five bedrooms and full staff mean you can soak in the sunshine with up to ten friends or family members in modern luxury.During your stay, a villa manager, Thai chef and housekeeper will see to your needs. An airport transfer and daily continental breakfast are also complimentary, and paddleboards, sea kayaks and windsurfing equipment are available on request. When you’re not out on the water, relax on the loungers surrounding the dramatic infinity pool, dine in the poolside sala, put a movie on the outdoor projector screens or share photos via Wi-Fi.At the heart of Baan Hinyai is a beautiful open-plan great room with high ceilings and warm natural textures of stone and wood. A pair of sectionals has plenty of room for everyone to sit, as does a broad, live-edge dining table. Though chef service is included in your holiday, the great room also has a fully equipped kitchen.The villa has four bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and sea views, as well as the same elements of wood and stone that make the great room so appealing.With the beach at your doorstep, it’s easy to step out for a morning of building sandcastles or an afternoon of strolling, honeymoon-style, with your sweetheart. For a choice of shops and restaurants, make the 8 km drive into the town of Lamai. Don’t miss the chance to see the nearby Na Muang waterfall, a pretty cascade reached by a walk through a forest.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.With waterfront access to Plai Laem and incredible views of Thailand’s Gulf from nearly every inch, Villa Manta Samui makes the most of its lush, tropical location. The perfect home base for a family getaway, golf trip, or vacation with friends, this luxurious rental features four en-suite bedrooms, all with ocean views, and plenty of thoughtfully designed spaces for group gatherings. Nearby, you’ll find spa facilities, golf, tennis, rain forest, and bustling city life, all yours to discover on your next amazing Luxury Retreat.Floor-to-ceiling openings stretch the length of Villa Manta Samui’s main living room, inviting the full length of the terrace to expand your tropical social setting, and allowing fresh sea breeze and natural sunlight to fill the villa’s open concept interior. Inside, soothing cream tones, warm wood trim, and bright accents on fabrics and throw pillows combine to create a space that is exciting, relaxing, and elegant, all at the same time. Throughout the villa, you’ll enjoy state of the art appliances and electronics. There’s a fully equipped kitchen, along with formal and alfresco dining for the whole group. And, to provide the perfect backdrop for any occasion, you’ll have amazing ocean views.On the terrace, you’ll love lounging by the infinity pool and relaxing in the spa, while you gaze upon the Gulf of Thailand. Inside, you’ll appreciate features like smart television, the pool table, Wi-Fi, the sound system, air conditioning, and more.Down on Plai Laem, your own little sandy shoreline, you’ll find two kayaks to help with your aquatic exploration of Koh Samui. If you’d like to visit some of the other beaches in the area, you’ll find four more ranging from a few hundred meters to three-kilometers away. If there’s a golfer in the group, Bohput Hills and Santiburi Samui golf courses are two of the best in the area; both are just a few minute drives. And, if it’s shopping, dining, and nightlife you’re looking for, head to Plai Laem’s vibrant Main Street, just nine-kilometers from Villa Manta Samui.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated within Dhevatara Cove, one of the finest luxury communities on Koh Samui, Baan Samlarn offers a unique experience of this extraordinary island paradise. The beachfront villa features panoramic sunset views of the Gulf of Thailand, expansive outdoor living and dining areas, and exquisitely decorated interiors endowed with vintage furnishings, original artwork, and high-end modern appliances. Guests enjoy access to the community's sauna and fitness room as well as an extraordinary in-villa staff including a private Thai chef. Ideal for families, the villa features five superb bedroom suites accommodating ten guests.The expansive swimming pool and hot tub are framed in a beautiful teak deck, with plentiful lounge chairs beckoning you to relish the sunlight or sip cool drinks in the shade of parasols. Step across the lush lawn onto the white-sand beach for a plunge in the luminous sea, and rinse in the outdoor shower before joining your loved-ones for an afternoon meal. Perched between the pool and beach, the open-air sala with lounge and dining table is ideal for alfresco delights in the ocean air.Beside the pool deck, the fabulous great room pavilion features broad doors opening to the pool and oceanfront lawn. Lovely fans hang from the high, vaulted ceiling, and abundant natural light streams in through cathedral windows. At the far end of the pool is the main dining room, featuring an ocean-view table for eight beside an open wall. enter the villa via an enchanting stepping-stone path across a pond in the front garden.The bedrooms are spacious and exquisitely furnished, and all open to the terrace, gardens, or a private balcony. Each room has its own charming character, with original artwork and a unique color palette harmonizing with the vibrant hues of the gardens and sea. All five rooms enjoy superb ensuite bathrooms, some with alfresco showers.You may never want to leave the private sanctuary of Baan Samlarn, yet plentiful dining options, shops, and adventures are within an easy drive of your door. Taling Ngam Beach and the famous temples of Wat Nara Charoen Suk and Wat Kiri Wongkaram are lovely destinations, and both Paradise Park and Secret Buddha Garden are an easy drive inland through the exquisite forests of Koh Samui.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Phuket's Andara Villa seventeen is the perfect vacation destination for large families, and groups of friends and colleagues. With it's seven spacious en-suite bedrooms and private atmosphere, this luxurious villa is ideal for a golf trip, corporate retreat, or family reunion. And, with Phuket's wide range of activities and attractions, all within thirty kilometers, you'll have plenty of beaches, golf courses, shopping centers, and historical sites to visit on your next Luxury Retreats vacation.Villa Andara Seventeen's decor features an eclectic mixture of traditional Thai statues, ornate detailing, an extensive color palette, and modern designer furniture. With plenty of warm wood textures and numerous openings to beautiful natural surroundings, this villa has a welcoming open-air atmosphere that allows the interior to merge seamlessly with the terrace. In the kitchen, it's all modern with state of the art appliances, granite countertops, and a bright, social ambiance.Magnificent ocean views provide the perfect background for an amazing Thai dinner prepared by the included private chef. All you'll have to do is decide whether to eat in the formal area inside, or under the alfresco dining pavilion on the terrace. After dinner, spend your night relaxing in one of the outdoor lounge areas by the pool, sharing a bottle from the wine fridge, and watching as the sun disappears into the horizon. Or, maybe you'd rather spend the evening inside, making use of the Wi-Fi, air conditioning, satellite television, and entertainment room.The nearest beachfront is just a few minutes away on the sandy shores of Kamala Beach. This quiet bay is known as one of the most beautiful places in Phuket with an endless stretch of white sand and lush forested hills surrounding its calm waters. If there's a golfer or two in the group, they're in luck, as Thailand is known for its incredibly scenic courses, three of which are within twenty-five kilometers. And, the city center of Phuket is nearby as well, where you'll find Jungceylon Shopping Centre, Talad Kaset Night Market, and plenty of authentic Thai cuisine.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Double your tropical fun at Tawantok Beach Estate. This beautiful Koh Samui vacation rental is made up of two separate villas that can be reserved independently or booked as one ten-bedroom luxury property for up to twenty guests. An oceanfront setting on quiet Lipa Noi Beach and a full staff round out its charms.Your holiday at Tawantok Beach Estate includes the services of a private Chef, Villa Manager and housekeeper, as well as continental breakfast each day. Each of the property’s two villas has an infinity pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas and a barbecue, and they share a tennis court. The indoor amenities at each house range from a satellite television to Wi-Fi.The open-plan layouts of the estate’s two houses makes it easy to gather with friends and family. In each, you’ll find a great room with a spacious sitting area, a dining area for twelve and a fully equipped kitchen. Open the glass sliding doors to let the sea breezes waft through the great room, or close them and flip on the air conditioning to keep it comfortable.Each house at Tawantok Beach Estate has four bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with a lounge area and ocean views, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All ten bedrooms have honeymoon-suite-inspired features such as alfresco showers in the ensuite bathrooms. For larger parties, an additional queen bed is available on the mezzanine level of each master suite.Spend your stay strolling the white sands or splashing in the turquoise waters on tranquil Lipa Noi Beach, just in front of the villa, or make the short drive to the livelier scene at Nikki Beach, where you can sit down to a great brunch or make it a fun evening out. Ferry access is also a short drive away, as are dining and souvenir shopping in downtown Nathon.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steal away to one of the most secluded corners of Koh Samui at The Headland Villa 5. Part of the exclusive Headland, this beautifully appointed vacation rental puts you close to the picturesque Baan Taling Ngam and quiet Lamai Beach. Reserve its four bedrooms for a tropical getaway with family, a holiday in the sun with friends or even an indulgent island honeymoon.Not only does the villa offer outdoor living areas with an infinity pool and lounge furniture, it boasts private access to a beach. Inside, its suite of high-tech amenities ranges from satellite television and a DVD player and Wi-Fi. A concierge, villa manager and housekeeper will ensure your comfort during your stay.Fold-away glass walls link the outdoor living areas to the bright, open-plan interiors. Settle in to one of the sectionals in the living room and let the warm breezes waft over you, or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen to recount the day’s adventures. A separate television lounge is the perfect place for kids to play while grown-ups prep dinner or catch up.This luxury property has two bedrooms with double beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All but one of the twin bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and all four bedrooms have air conditioning.The Headland Villa 5 is a 5-minute walk from the Baan Sabai Resort and Spa, and a 5-minute drive from the ferry and the famed Five Islands restaurant. While it’s within walking distance of a rocky beach, it’s also within a 16 km drive of quiet Lamai Beach if you’d like to swim. Be sure to set aside a morning to explore the town of Nathon, 11 km away by car, where you’ll find an assortment of shops, eateries and coffee spots offering products and treats that you can only find on Koh Samui.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Note: This villa can be rented in conjunction with other villas.

listing.listing_description: Perched on one of the most exclusive headlands on Phuket, this villa offers a towering view of the calm blue Andaman sea beyond. The interiors are peerless amongst the Kamala beach villas; spread over two levels with peaceful garden paths and contemplative balconies. Inspired by traditional Thai design, the villa is just a few minutes by car from both the FantaSea cultural park and Patong town.Villa Talaefun’s position is nothing short of enviable. The villa has been constructed around the unimpeded ocean view. Guests entering the villa are instantly struck by the vertical grandeur of the property, as the pointed Lanna-style roof reaches into the sky. Guests can relax and recline in the sumptuous interiors, replete with masterfully carved furniture, delightfully comfortable furniture, and soft white curtains which can be pulled to create a calm, cool space as the sun dazzles down outside. The artful pathways and walkways of the villa’s gardens and green spaces invite thoughtful walkers, with the outdoor dining area a dream spot for group gatherings at the end of an active day.Located on the Millionaire’s Mile, the villa is just a handful of minutes from Kamala beach to the north, and just slightly further from Patong Beach to the south, each of which offer broad expanses of tropical sands, shady trees and enjoyable beach bars. Set forth and explore the delights that Phuket island has to offer, from delicious, roadside street food in the local towns, to exciting day-cruises exploring offshore islands and hidden coves. When night falls, guests can take in the moonlit waves and ship lights at sea from the terrace with a cool drink in hand, while planning further trips around this paradise island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The View earns its title with perhaps the finest ocean prospect along the west coast of Koh Samui. Built gracefully into a lush hillside at Taling Ngam above a dreamy cove and private beach, the stunning modern home surveys panoramic vistas of the Gulf of Thailand and the Five Islands. The villa features five spacious bedroom suites in addition to the kids' bunk room that can accommodate up to 6 children. The villa offers the ideal accommodations for families or destination wedding guests. An extraordinary private staff includes a villa manager, concierge, and Thai chef, and complimentary continental breakfast and airport transfer are provided.The villa's design blurs the line between exterior and interior living, inviting you to long days and evenings amid enchanting breezes and vistas. Soak your body in the bubbling spa and plunge into the saltwater pool. Take a sea kayak onto the water or dive into the luminous waves, and savor the exquisite sunlight on beachside lounge chairs. Kindle the barbecue in the afternoon as the kids play on the ample lawn, and sip refreshments from the lovely poolside bar as the sun approaches the horizon.The main interior living and dining rooms feature broad, retractable glass walls that form a veranda-like setting with lofty sea views—an ideal theater for experiencing the sublime sunsets of Koh Samui. After relishing a home-catered feast at the superb dining table, return to the living room to watch a favorite film on the large projector screen.The villa features four bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms, while the children's bunkroom and the bedroom featuring two twin-size beds share a bathroom between them. All of the bedrooms enjoy air conditioning. The four king suites gaze out on stunning ocean views and include high-end entertainment systems, and remote-controlled blinds. Two of the bathrooms feature semi-alfresco bathrooms (one with outdoor shower, one with outdoor bathtub).Beyond the private paradise of The View, you're within easy reach of some of the finest activities and destinations on the island. Nathon is an easy drive away, where you can catch a ferry to the extraordinary Ang Thong National Marine Park. The vicinity abounds in excellent resorts, spas, watersports, wellness facilities, and family-friendly adventures, including TopCats Freshwater Fishing and Marga Yoga Center.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Surrounded by lush tropical greenery and expertly manicured gardens, this five bedroom villa offers the ideal home base for those wishing to celebrate Thailand’s gorgeous natural environment. Perfect for a family getaway or golf vacation with friends, Andara Phuket Villa 16 has spacious areas for group gatherings and plenty of smaller nooks for intimate occasions. Nearby, you’ll have some of Phuket’s most prestigious golf courses, beautiful beaches, ancient temples, and shopping destinations. And, if you’re traveling with kids, Fantasea Theme Park and Phuket Outdoor Adventures are both exciting places to spend an afternoon.Natural wood and plush seating create a warm, welcoming atmosphere within Andara Phuket Villa 16’s open concept interior. Decorated with traditional, intricate Thai works of art and furniture, you’ll feel instant relaxation upon entering this authentic Thai beach house. And, with so many openings to the terrace, lawns, and balcony, the ocean view, fresh breeze, and natural sunlight of Thailand are ever present.Andara Phuket Villa 16 comes with a fully equipped kitchen, formal dining for eight, an alfresco dining area, and a chef to prepare daily Thai cuisine for you and your group. Inside, tech features include Wi-Fi, satellite television, a sound system, security, and air conditioning. On the terrace, you’ll love the infinity pool, furnished living spaces, sun beds, and incredible ocean view. And, each bedroom comes with a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom, and an ocean view of its own.Phuket has some of the most desirable beaches on the planet, and there are plenty of them surrounding Andara Phuket Villa 16. To fully experience the dynamic range of beaches in Thailand, start with Patong and Kamala. With plenty of beachfront bars, restaurants, shops, and a party-atmosphere, Patong Beach is easily the most popular in the area. And, it’s quite close to Bangla Road, Phuket’s nightlife district. On the other end of the spectrum, you have Kamala Beach, a favorite among locals and returning visitors. Kamala Beach is one of Phuket’s best-kept secrets. Surrounded by forested hills, this untouched paradise is perfect for relaxation, family fun, and incredible sunsets.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take yourself far out of the ordinary at The Aquila. From this luxury villa’s perch above a quiet cove on the Andaman Sea, only one other set of lights is visible at night—the ultimate in a scenic private location. A full staff and the contemporary, Asian-influenced interiors of this vacation rental will ease you into the laid-back Phuket lifestyle in no time.Your holiday at The Aquila begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, security staff and property manager, making it the perfect destination for a relaxed family getaway or honeymoon away from it all. Spend your time taking in the views—and soaking in the tropical sun—from the expansive outdoor living area, which includes rows of loungers by an infinity pool, shaded sitting and dining areas, and a barbecue. Inside, the property features spa and exercise rooms, a bar and lounge, a sound system, and even a library.Simple elegance defines the look and feel of the villa’s interiors. Neutral-toned sofas and sectionals, cool charcoal-hued tile floors and walls of windows keep the multiple living rooms refined yet airy, while built-in cabinets add an understated, thoughtful touch to a dining room that seats sixteen. Flat-fronted white cabinets and contrasting black countertops in the fully equipped kitchen are a study in minimalist chic.The seven bedrooms at The Aquila are split between the guest pavilion and the arrival pavilion; all have en-suite bathrooms, balconies and ocean views. There are six bedrooms in the guest pavilion: four with king beds, lounge areas and al-fresco showers, and two with two twin beds each. The arrival pavilion has one bedroom with a king bed, its own living area and an outdoor shower.In spite of the villa’s hidden-away location on a quiet cove, it’s only a 10-minute drive from Kamala Beach, known for its beautiful sand and trendy beach clubs. The property is also close to Patong Beach, Surin Beach, FantaSea and even Laguna Golf Phuket. Make the short drive into central Phuket and board an excursion from the Royal Phuket Marina or sample local specialties from the night market.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover one of the best-kept secrets on Koh Samui at Villa Riva. Perched on a headland above secluded Bang Por Beach, this beautiful traditionally inspired vacation rental is a quiet, private escape perfect for a family reunion, a laid-back getaway with friends or a unique destination wedding. Its seven bedrooms, resort-worthy amenities and full staff provide luxury accommodations for up to fourteen guests.Your holiday at Villa Riva begins with an airport meet-and-greet and continues with daily breakfast, plus the services of a Thai chef, English-speaking manager and housekeeper. Enjoy the views from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, custom jetted tub, and living and dining areas, practice your serve on the tennis court or unwind with the help of the home theater, wine cellar, and dry and wet saunas.There’s plenty of room for everyone to gather in an open-concept great room, where inviting warm wood accents and crisp white tones adorn the sitting and dining areas. A graceful pagoda-inspired roof tops the double-height space, and fold-away glass doors to the terrace add to the breezy feel. While chef service is part of your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen.The main house at Villa Riva has three bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. The property also has one pavilion with two king bedrooms, plus a second pavilion with one king bedroom that’s the ideal honeymoon-style retreat. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.With a stretch of beautiful beach just below the villa, it’s easy to step down to the shore and see what makes Koh Samui such a popular sun destination. (Hint: it’s to do with the soft sands and turquoise waters.) The villa is also just a 6 km drive from the nearest golf course, and a 10 km drive from shopping and dining in the town of Bophut.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Vacation like a star at Iniala Villa Siam, a luxury Phuket vacation rental unlike any other. Filled with incredible pieces of Thai art and design, this breathtaking contemporary property stirs both spirit and senses with its unique architecture and thoughtful amenities. A full staff and three suite-style bedrooms make this an intimate beachfront retreat for a family or small group of friends.Your holiday at Iniala Villa Siam includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, driver, butler and spa therapist, so indulge in local specialties from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining area, drinks by the infinity pool or a treatment in the massage room. In between, you can bask in the tropical sun on a lounge chair on the terrace, catching up on reading or just taking in the views of the Andaman Sea in front of you.The two curving halves of the villa are meant to represent hands of welcome, and the interiors continue this inviting, cocooning atmosphere in a modern way. The gallery-like living and dining room contains collections of Thai ceramics, photography and tapestry unlike anything you’ve seen before, all carefully assembled by designer Eggarat Wongcharit. Hanging sofas are novel yet comfortable, as are the jewelry-like gold and white dining chairs grouped around the glass-topped table. Other unique details include the words from sacred Buddhist texts and woven bamboo adorning the walls of the private spa room, designed to resemble the inside of a traditional Thai temple bell.Each of the three bedrooms at Iniala Villa Siam is luxe enough to be a honeymoon suite, with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and terrace. Beautiful woven bamboo work by the artist Korakot adds organic texture in one suite, while in another, a spray of bronze lotus flowers and leaves washes over the ceiling and walls.Thanks to the oceanfront location of Iniala Villa Siam, it’s only steps from the villa to Natai Beach. You can also take a day trip to Mai Khao Beach, 24 km away, Nai Thon Beach, 37 km away, and Surin Beach, 47 km away. If you can tear yourself away from the pool and the beach, stroll over the Sa Phan Sarasin Bridge, spend a day at Sirinat National Park or FantaSea, explore Phuket or seek out memorable souvenirs at Central Festival Shopping Center. Revel in a moment of peace at Wat Chalong Temple or enjoy the famously bustling nightlife in Patong. At the end of your trip, take the complimentary airport transfer from Iniala Villa Siam to Phuket International Airport, 31 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover a contemporary twist on Thai style—and a fresh take on the luxury beach resort—at Iniala Penthouse Suite. From the unique curving roofline and sleek terrace facing the Andaman Sea to unique artwork and custom furnishings, this one-bedroom Phuket vacation rental is unlike any place you’ve stayed before. Whether you’re visiting the Iniala Beach House complex for a family occasion or escaping on your honeymoon, let the villa’s full staff cater to your every need during your stay.An infinity pool runs through the penthouse, ending in the middle of a terrace with al-fresco lounging and dining areas and beckoning you outside. After a swim in the pool or the ocean just steps away, rinse off in the outdoor shower. Meals are included in your stay, so ask your chef to surprise you with something from the barbecue or celebrate with a favorite dish that brings back fond memories. A driver and butler are also on hand, and—in case you need help relaxing—a spa therapist is available to provide treatments in the villa’s private spa and massage room.The sculptural interiors of Iniala Penthouse Suite, custom designed by Graham Lamb, feel almost like an extension of the landscape. Glass walls on the oceanfront side of the villa flood the space with sunlight and sea views, and large doors can be opened to let in the warm breezes off the water. Circular sofas are set into soft, sand-toned carpet so that walking across the room feels like strolling across the beach, and even accents like an onyx table and round poufs have the look of stones polished by the waves. Take a seat at the breakfast bar to enjoy a meal prepared by your chef, or use the fully equipped kitchen for your own culinary endeavors.The villa’s single bedroom can be opened to the terrace or closed off behind floor-length drapes for a more intimate space. There are two king beds, one of which is rendered in white leather and dramatically suspended for a cocoon-like feel. Not only does the bedroom have an en-suite bathroom, but an infinity-edge hot tub and round, glassed-in shower are actually set into the plush carpet, just like the sofas in the living room.Your holiday at Iniala Penthouse Suite begins with a transfer from Phuket International Airport, 31 km away. Once you’ve arrived at the villa, you’re just steps away from Natai Beach and a short drive from Mai Khao Beach, Nai Thon Beach and Surin Beach. If you’d like to see more of Thailand during your stay, take advantage of the photo ops on Sa Phan Sarasin bridge, explore Sirinat National Park, glimpse the local culture with a show at FantaSea or roam downtown Phuket. Search for the perfect souvenir at Central Festival Shopping Center and enjoy a blissful moment of peace at Wat Chalong Temple before braving the famously lively nightlife of Patong.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Baan Kilee is a delightful beachfront villa on Lipa Noi Beach, along the west coast of Koh Samui. An ideal resort-alternative for families, the home features three swimming pools (including two kids' pools), a sea-kayak, a playground, beachfront dining, and a children's playroom that can be converted into a kids' bedroom. The talented and attentive staff includes a personal Thai chef and a villa manager.The home is perfectly designed to optimize its seaside position and panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand. An expansive infinite pool of beautiful blue tile extends along the edge of the beach, inviting you to savor a delicious plunge or bask in the sun's rays on semi-submerged lounge chairs. Between the pool and the beach is a lovely dining table, an enchanting venue for home-catered feasts in the ocean breeze. Sip evening cocktails at the poolside bar and marvel at the sunset from the lip of the sea.A gorgeous grass courtyard extends from the pool toward the main pavilion, creating a lovely cloistered ambiance bathed in ocean air The main dining room features an open wall and expansive views, its table accompanied by a pair of stunning bed swings and exquisite Buddhist décor. The neighboring home theater is ideal for family movie night.The villa's superb bedrooms provide dreamy private havens infused with the sounds of waves and swaying palms. There are four king suites (one of which includes two children's beds as well), one suite with a pair of single beds, and a playroom suite with three single beds. All of the rooms feature ensuite bathrooms, and five include satellite televisions. There are two additional loft sleeping spaces accessible by ladder.Beyond the private paradise of Baan Kilee, you're about ten minutes from the town of Nathon, where you can catch a boat for a daytrip to Angthong National Marine Park. The neighboring inland forests include the enchanting Buddhist sites of Wat Kiri Wongkaram, Wat Sila Ngu, and Secret Buddha Garden, as well as the beautiful Hin Lat Waterfall. Santiburi Golf Course is about forty minutes to the north.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A living art installation for fans of fantasy and romance awaits at Iniala Collector’s Villa. A team of leading designers have created a series of whimsical spaces housed in a contemporary twist on a classic Thai house. Situated on the golden sands of Natai Beach near Phuket, with wonderful sunset views over the Andaman Sea, from golden teak to beautiful tiling, this enticing creation represents a sublime deviation from the normal.The masterful design and decor will leave you speechless. The villa evokes the feeling of being on the set of a palace set in a futuristic sci-fi film. The ceramic temple of Wat Arun inspires the sea blue living room, its walls encrusted with 3,000 ceramic plates. The spectacular cinema is filled with fabulous furry green Cipria sofas and complete with surround sound and a wonderful 160-inch screen. The Pearl Spa is covered in mother of pearl, with gold and bronze furniture creating a shimmering sanctuary. The formal dining room sits cool and encased in glass, hovering over the edge of the infinity swimming pool.This villa provides a dedicated staff with a driver, butler, chef, spa therapist and housekeeper. Allow Iniala Collector Villa’s ace chef to take you on a journey of culinary wonder, preparing meals to your tastes. Enjoy a massage that will take you deep into a Zen-like state. Get the holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!The bedrooms within the Iniala Collector’s Villa are each as individual as their designers. Jaime Hayon from Spain has created a bright beach suite, with imaginative details such as the ‘clown’ door. From Ireland’s Joseph Walsh, a symphony of ash wood and stone showcase a bed frame of layered, arched woods akin to a princess’ sleeping chamber. Finally, the sensual boudoir from New Zealand’s Mark Brazier-Jones provides an interior awash with silks, crystal and metal.Iniala Collector’s Villa is a private vacation rental leaving little to be desired. Far from the general hubs of Phuket, this oceanfront villa permits rejuvenation in a setting that stimulates all five of your known senses. You will nonetheless be within easy driving distance of a number of attractions and activities including the Wat Chalong Temple, Phuket Town and golf at Blue Canyon. Bring the family or organize a wedding… or have it all to yourself for a decadent honeymoon. Have your vacation, your way!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that these rates are dynamic. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialist for the best available rate.This stunning four-bedroom villa enjoys a prime perch within Layan Residences by Anantara, an exclusive residential community on the west coast of Phuket Island within Anantara Layan Phuket Resort. The two-story home features 1,817 square meters of exquisitely designed space, balancing contemporary style with vintage Thai influences. Superb features include an ample infinity swimming pool, an enchanting dining sala, and a roof deck with breathtaking, panoramic views of Layan Bay, the Andaman Sea, and the famous sunsets of Phuket. Layan Beach is just a short walk away, and guests additionally enjoy access to the resort's world-class amenities. Your vacation rental includes butler services as well as in-villa breakfast and airport transfer.Nestled amid lush gardens, the expansive terrace with twenty-one-meter infinity pool offers a private setting to relish the company of family and friends. Step into the gem-toned water for a delicious dip, and revel in the sunlight on plentiful lounge chairs. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, gather for alfresco meals in the enchanting sala. Admire the sunset from the outdoor lounge or rooftop deck, and savor the evening amid enchanting torchlight.Large glass walls open from the terrace to the villa's interiors, infusing the home with abundant natural light and delicious breezes. The living room features comfortable sofas, a TV, and a small dining table, while the separate dining room includes a circular, sea-view table for eight served by an open, fully equipped kitchen. Simple yet exquisite décor evokes the timeless spirit of Thailand while accentuating the serenity of the present moment.All four bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning. The master suite includes a king bed, a private lounge area, a walk-in closet, and a jetted tub in its deluxe bathroom. There is one guest suite with a king bed, one with a queen, and one with two queen beds.Beyond your private villa, you're within easy reach of the resort's outstanding offerings, including restaurants, a fitness center, a kids' club, parlor games, yoga, Pilates, a tennis court, and Anantara Spa. The resort also includes a chapel, while proximity to Phuket International Airport ensures convenience for families and destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

One of fifteen beautifully designed luxury villas adjoining the Anantara Layan Phuket Resort, this expansive vacation rental is a private retreat that still gives you access to resort amenities. Book a relaxed stay with the extended family or reserve the property for a tropical getaway with up to twelve friends.Guests of the Seaview Residence enjoy a complimentary airport transfer, daily breakfast in the villa and butler service. If the pampering doesn’t help you relax, the outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, plenty of loungers, barbecue and al-fresco dining area, all overlooking the sea, certainly will. The villa also features its own spa, exercise room, TV, Wi-Fi, and indoor and outdoor sound systems.Even when you’re inside, floor-to-ceiling windows frame the dramatic views of mountains, beach and sea. The open-concept living areas are sleek yet inviting, with thoughtful details such as built-in bookshelves and subtly paneled walls stretching to the high ceilings. Warm wood tones link the living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen.The Seaview Residence has four bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two double beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, TVs and air conditioning, and several have additional features such as walk-in closets and desk areas.Your stay at the residence also includes access to the pool, tennis court and kids club at the nearby Anantara Layan Phuket Resort. Try out water sports using the resort’s equipment, indulge in a spa treatment or join couples on honeymoon for a romantic dinner in one of the restaurants. The villa’s location in the Thalang area is also just a 1-minute walk from Layan Beach and a short drive from a beach club, spa and golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Although it’s designed in a minimalistic fashion, don't be fooled, this luxury vacation rental is absolutely loaded with top of the line features. Features like beachfront access to Natai Beach, a state of the art gym, and every bedroom having an ocean view, prove that this Summer Estate is simply the best. Located in Phang Nga, Thailand, this private luxury rental is perfect for a family beach vacation or a golf trip with friends.Minimalistic interior design creates a sleek and stylish atmosphere. It doesn’t lean on gimmicks to impress, it’s impressive because it’s designed well. Guests focus is easily directed to the more important vacation desires, like watching the sun set over the ocean while you sip a glass of wine on your private beachfront. When it’s time to head back inside, you’ll be well taken care of. Modern designer furniture is the decor of the open concept living space. Numerous openings to the terrace create a free flowing environment for guests and fresh ocean breeze. The predominantly white colour scheme is clean and calming with hints of elegance. In the kitchen, high-end appliances and plenty of countertop workspace make meal prep a breeze, or you could let the included chef take care of it.Outside, there’s essentially a whole other house on the terrace. With a stainless steel kitchen, barbecue, alfresco dining, and furnished living areas, you can exist outdoors just as easily as you can inside, which is ideal in such a perfect climate. Also on the terrace, there’s a refreshing infinity pool and lounge chairs. For some backyard or beachfront activity, Summer Estate comes with a pool raft, table tennis, body boards, sports equipment, Badminton, and a kayak.About an hours’ drive from the villa, you’ll find the Red Mountain Golf Course and Old Town Phuket. Whether you’re looking for a scenic afternoon on a challenging golf course, or a shopping trip and a night out, you’ll find it along the coast.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Reminisce with old friends in the sunken terrace lounge while sweeping hillside and ocean views set a breezy tone at this modern villa in Koh Samui. Refresh in the infinity pool or melt any lingering stress away in the hot tub. Then, spend the late afternoon swimming 4 minutes away at Rock Beach or on the links of Royal Samui Golf Course 6 minutes from home. Villa Danisa stretches across an east-facing hillside in Bophut. Favoring length over depth, the majority of Danisa’s rooms enjoy the sunrise through floor-to-ceiling windows and openings to the terrace. After you’ve decided what the private chef should make for dinner, stream a few episodes on the Smart TV and relax in the air-conditioned lounge before dinner at the 8-seat formal setting. In the evening, mix up a few tropical cocktails and watch as the sun disappears on the furnished terrace lounge. Turn up the integrated sound system us the house Wi-Fi to stream the perfect soundtrack. Later, move the party inside for a little friendly competition in the games, where you’ll find a pool and foosball table. Or, go in the opposite direction and bring in a masseuse for treatment in the massage room. Pack your safari clothes and head to Na Muang Park or Samui Rainforest to snap a few picks amongst Thailand’s lush greenery. 10 minute’s from home, the city of Chaweng is excellent for a shopping trip or dinner, with 100’s of bars and restaurants to choose from. Later, the pedestrian street in Fisherman’s Village is bustling spot to bar hop until you find the perfect place to dance the night away. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that these rates are dynamic. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialist for the best available rate. This three-bedroom villa on the west coast of Phuket is situated within Layan Residences by Anantara, an extraordinary luxury community within the Anantara Layan Phuket Resort. Just a short walk from the beach, the two-story home enjoys a lofty position on the lush hillside overlooking Layan Bay and the Andaman Sea. Its expansive pool terrace, rooftop decks, and luminous interiors offer an exquisite balance of contemporary style and classic Thai character, enhanced by high-end technologies and butler services. Superb accommodations for six make this villa an excellent choice for families and destination wedding guests.An infinity swimming pool (twenty-one meters in length) stretches the length of the terrace, its gem-toned surface meshing with the vast panorama of verdant coastline and azure sea. Dip into its refreshing waters and savor the sunlight on plentiful lounge chairs oriented toward the horizon. Stroll to Layan Beach and return to alfresco meals in the beautiful sala. Admire the sublime sunset from this privileged vantage, and celebrate under the stars amid enchanting torch light.Large glass doors infuse the interiors with abundant a dreamy luminescence and sea-kissed air. The main salon features a comfortable TV lounge and a small table, while the dining room houses a circular table with sweeping views, served by an open kitchen with gourmet appliances. Natural wood accents, soft tones, and choice touches of local artistry and heritage create a serene and inspiring ambiance. The villa is air-conditioned and includes an office and Bose surround sound.The villa features two deluxe king suites as well as smaller suite with two twin beds. All three rooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms, high-end TVs, and air conditioning. Both the master suite and the guest king suite include private lounges, walk-in closets, desks, and deluxe bathrooms with jetted tubs.The villa's position balances privacy with easy access to the resort's fabulous offerings, including restaurants, a fitness center, a kids' club, parlor games, yoga, Pilates, a tennis court, and Anantara Spa. Dream Beach Club is just two kilometers away, and you're an easy drive to Banyan Tree Spa, the Laguna Phuket Golf Club, and Banana Beach. Your vacation rental includes complimentary transfer to nearby Phuket International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The luxury villa Koh Koon sprawls over the hillside overlooking Chaweng Bay on the island of Koh Samui. This East meets Mediterranean property offers an eclectic, yet harmonious mix of Asian and European styles. It’s tranquil location, coupled with its spacious grounds and stylish interiors make this vacation rental ideal for special events, family holidays and corporate retreats.The open plan living and dining area features oversized couches, quirky lighting and mixed objets d’art. An aged-wood dining table seats eighteen. With wine flowing, music playing and laughter chiming, the villa’s chef will take you on a journey through Thai and foreign cuisine. Relax and enjoy a game of billiards, foosball or darts. There is also a multi-purpose area that can be used as a television lounge, massage room or additional sleeping area. The expansive infinity swimming pool takes center stage in the garden. To one side lies a pool bar and a dining sala, and to other, a covered pool lounge offers shade.While Koh Koon could easily be mistaken for a Mediterranean countryside retreat from the outside, the interiors also showcase native Thai style. The terrain has been carefully considered with the buildings blending into their natural surroundings. Giant boulders have been retained as garden features. Stone walls, terracotta roof tiles, wrought iron fittings and aged wooden shutters give this villa a distinct French farmhouse feel. The large function deck, built around a majestic tree, is perfect for yoga or an intimate wedding ceremony.Koh Koon accommodates up to fourteen adults and eight children. The master suite offers ocean views and a private terrace with alfresco shower. The en-suite bathroom includes his-and-hers marble vanities and a double rain shower. Koh Koon’s remaining seven bedrooms are housed in four separate pavilions. All have en-suite bathrooms and crisp, white linens. Polished concrete floors are cool underfoot, and Crete-stone walls add to the rustic feel. The bedrooms with their private terraces and seating areas offer solitude.Koh Koon’s vast lawns are great for children to run and play. In the garden, guests can enjoy a friendly game of pétanque or practice their golfing techniques on the putting green. While Koh Koon may look rustic, the facilities and service are five-star. The professional staff will take care of every whim, and the in-house concierge service will be happy to arrange excursions.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialist for the best available rate.This magnificent, six-bedroom villa is located within Layan Residences by Anantara, a luxury resort community on the west coast of Phuket Island. The expansive, 2,600-square-meter home is just a minute on foot from Layan Beach and offers extraordinary features for private enjoyment, including a twenty-one-meter infinity swimming pool, alfresco dining, an in-villa massage room, high-end technology for cooking and entertainment, and butler services. Guests additionally enjoy access to the superb amenities and activities of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort. The stunning design of the two-story home balances contemporary comforts with traditional Thai influences, most visible in the classic dining sala. Its six bedrooms (including dual master suites) accommodate up to fourteen guests.The villa enjoys a lofty position amid the lush coastal hills, with breathtaking views of Layan Bay and the sublime sunsets of Phuket. Savor a morning swim in the blue-tiled pool, and bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs beneath rustling palms. Relish alfresco meals in the sala, and settle into the comfortable lounge for evening cocktails amid enchanting torch light.High ceilings and ample glass walls infuse the home with exquisite light and air. The living room features comfortable sofas and a TV beside a small dining table, while the separate dining room includes a circular, sea-view table for eight served by an open, fully equipped kitchen. Soft tones, natural wood accents, and beautiful touches of local artistry and tradition create a serene yet inspiring ambiance.The villa features two master suites, each with a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with rain shower and bathtub. Three of the guest suites feature king beds and one has a pair of double beds, and all enjoy ensuite bathrooms.Beyond your private haven, you'll enjoy easy access to Layan Beach and the resort's world-class offerings, including fine restaurants, a fitness center, a kids' club, , a tennis court, and Anantara Spa. The resort also includes a chapel and forms a fabulous venue for weddings. Proximity to Phuket International Airport ensures convenience for families and destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched on the hillside of Phuket's Kamala Bay, with panoramic views overlooking its beach and the Andaman Sea, Villa Nevaeh's vantage point can't be beaten. You and your guests will instantly fall in love with Nevaeh's open-air design, and six en-suite, ocean view bedrooms, each one housed in its own private sleeping pavilion. The added privacy makes this villa perfect for couples or groups of friends on vacation together. Within a few kilometers of Nevaeh, you'll find the town of Phuket, incredible golf courses, and lots of sandy beachfront.With a contemporary spin on traditional Thai architecture, Nevaeh's designers have created an authentic homage to Thailand's unique style, while adding state of the art upgrades to maximize its luxurious features. Numerous openings to the terrace, rich wood tones, and an elegant white color scheme give Nevaeh's interior a breezy beach house vibe that is warm, inviting, and fun, while remaining more than suitable for formal occasions. The true beauty of this spacious getaway is its integration into the natural surroundings. With an amazing ocean view, gorgeous climate, and a free-flowing atmosphere, you'll be happy to ignore the line between inside and out.At dinner, Nevaeh comes with a fully equipped kitchen, formal and alfresco dining areas, and a private chef. Butler service and housekeeping are included as well. On the terrace, you'll love the infinity pool, living areas, and sun beds. Back inside, Nevaeh's unique features include an entertainment lounge, fitness room, office, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi.The closest beach area to Nevaeh is Kamala Beach, of which you'll have a great view from the terrace. Travel just a few minutes further, and you'll find Surin, Patong, and Nai Thon Beach. If it's golf you're after, Phuket has five amazing courses within twenty-kilometers of Nevaeh, all with dynamic scenery and unique characteristics. If you're traveling with children, Fantasea Phuket Theme Park is great for an afternoon outing. And, the town of Phuket offers high-end shopping, adventure tourism opportunities, and vibrant nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make lasting holiday memories at one of the finest properties on Cape Yamu at Villa Chloe. Set on a rise facing Phang Nga Bay, this beautifully designed luxury vacation rental boasts views of the islands neighboring Phuket, incredibly spacious indoor and outdoor living areas from which to enjoy them and a location close to beaches, golf and more.Your stay at Villa Chloe begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a private chef, housekeeper and property manager. After a complimentary breakfast, spend the day lounging by the infinity pool, volleying on the estate’s tennis court or dreaming up dishes to prepare on the barbecue and enjoy around the al-fresco table. For the evenings, there’s a media room, a sound system and Wi-Fi.Two levels of living space mean there’s plenty of room for friends and family to gather together or spread out. Upstairs, a vaulted ceiling is a traditional Thai touch in a sprawling living room. Downstairs, find an open-concept great room with sitting and dining areas, plus a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.There are two bedrooms in the main house at Villa Chloe and three in the guest house; all five have queen beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. One of the main-house bedrooms also has honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as an al-fresco jetted bathtub and sea views. Like the common spaces, the bedrooms are minimalist yet inviting, with neutral tones, polished floors and warm wood accents.The villa is within easy driving distance of two golf courses, several beaches—including popular Bang Tao and Surin beaches—and plenty of shopping and dining options. Book an excursion from the nearby Royal Phuket Marina, find one-of-a-kind souvenirs in Phuket Old Town or spend a night out on the town along lively Bangla Road.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
