listing.listing_description: This spectacular home on Koh Samui is situated in a quiet enclave along the east coast near Bophut and Chaweng. Perched on elevated land about five kilometers from the beach, the villa gazes out on panoramic views of Chaweng Bay. Its superb architectural design features tiered terraces cascading down the lush hillside, including a split-level infinity swimming pool fused by a central waterfall. Outstanding features include gourmet kitchens both indoors and alfresco, as well as a talented staff with private chef. Six bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to twelve in size.The villa's upper terrace extends from the main great room, forming a fabulous, indoor/outdoor space for relaxation and entertainment. The voluminous infinity pool includes a shallow area for children, and wraps around a lovely sunken lounge. The shaded veranda includes a beautiful alfresco dining table with seating for ten, and there is a large kitchen to the side of the pool, featuring a built-in barbecue and wet bar. The lower pool is perched between two of the bedroom suites, with lounge chairs for tranquil hours in the sun. Lovely lighting invites you to linger outdoors deep into the night.The great room opens wide to the upper terrace, as well as the garden patio by the front entrance—creating a lovely crosscurrent of sea-kissed air. The open-concept space features a comfortable lounge, a beautiful dining table for twelve, and a sleek modern kitchen with chef-grade appliances and breakfast bar. The harmonious design balances contemporary lines, gallery-worthy artwork, traditional Thai objects, and natural wood accents.Each of the bedrooms features a sumptuous king bed and an ensuite bathroom—three of which include alfresco bathtubs. All of the rooms open to furnished balconies or terraces, and several of the rooms include private lounge areas.The villa's lofty location balances exquisite privacy and seclusion with convenient access to some of the finest beaches, golf, and nightlife spots on Koh Samui. You're about five kilometers from three famous beaches—Chaweng, Chawent Noh, and Bophut—as well as Chaweng Town and Fisherman's Village. The international Airport is just over six kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Open-air architecture and a secluded location on the beach are a magical combination at Kirana Villa. Let your cares slip away on the breeze off the waters of Laem Sor at the contemporary living spaces—indoors and out—of this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental, while the staff takes care of the details. Six bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests in Bali-inspired style for a laid-back family reunion, relaxed holiday with friends or even an intimate oceanfront wedding and honeymoon.Your stay at Kirana Villa includes daily continental breakfast and the services of a chef, property manager and security guard, freeing you to catch up on reading in a lounger on the terrace or watch the waves from the shaded sitting area on the terrace. There’s a smaller pool for children, a larger infinity pool where adults or older kids can do laps and an outdoor shower for rinsing off after sessions in the pool or the sea. Serve drinks from the indoor or outdoor bars while the barbecue heats up, then sit down to the al-fresco dining area and watch the sun set over the mainland during dinner.Behind the villa’s imposing wooden entrance doors, a stunning open hallway leads to the great-room pavilion facing the water. There, several sets of sliding doors open to the children’s pool, and a spectacular fold-away glass wall opens to the terrace and sea views. An open-plan layout means that the casual sitting area, bistro-style dining table and fully equipped kitchen all share the bright, modern space.By contrast, the six bedrooms at Kirana Villa are private havens. Each has an en-suite bathroom, an indulgent dressing or lounge area and its own balcony. Adults will love the five bedrooms with king beds, while kids will appreciate having their own room with two bunk beds. Like the common areas, however, the bedrooms use natural-fiber rugs, neutral tones, textured wooden accents and statement-making artwork for a chic look and organic feel.From the villa’s location on the golden sands and shallow waters of Coco Beach, where you can swim, snorkel or explore via paddleboard or kayak, it’s less than 11 km to popular Lamai Beach and Nikki Beach and 32 km or less to the two nearest golf courses. Find shopping and dining on the town’s main street, 11 km away, or seek out adventure at Na Muang Safari Park or on a trek through the Koh Samui rainforest.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tropical sunshine glitters on the infinity pool—and actually powers this eco-friendly villa on the Phuket coast that’s only accessible by boat. Manicured gardens define your own little world, double-height ceilings invite light into the sleek interiors, and a full staff provides an all-inclusive-style stay. Golf-cart down to the 110-meter white-sand beach to swim, snorkel, kayak, or even fish. This luxury property is as well appointed as a resort, with an infinity pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas, a barbecue, tennis and bocce courts, plus mountain bikes, kayaks, and snorkel and fishing gear. Stretch out in the indoor exercise room or get a massage from the in-house therapist before challenging friends and family at the pool table, shaking up a cocktail at the wet bar, and watching a movie in the media room. The more than 26,000 square feet of living space at this vacation rental are centered on a two-story great room anchored by four imposing beams and a mobile-style work of art. The high-contrast look of dark wood against cream furniture continues in the TV room, dining area for 12, and the fully equipped kitchen. Each of the villa’s 6 bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area, and a terrace or balcony. After a day out in the warm Thailand sun, flip on the air conditioning and sip a beverage from each bedroom’s mini-refrigerator. You’ll need to take a boat to access this incredibly private corner of the Tambon Thep Krasatti area at the start of your holiday, but once you’ve arrived, a golf cart makes it easy to get around. If you’d like to see more of Phuket, ask the concierge and chauffeur to arrange a visit to Naithon Beach, the Laguna Phuket Golf Club, or the Banyan Tree Spa. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From the welcoming recliners of this idyllic Thai villa, guests can take in the stunningly blue waters of the Andaman sea and the green hillsides beyond. Complete with an impressive, flower-bordered infinity pool, guests can linger at the delightful wet bar and bask in the poolside seating and air-conditioned interiors. Minutes away lies renowned Patong Beach and Phuket island’s famous night-life.Constructed with a nod to the traditional Lanna architectural style, the steep wooden roof of the villa and pool-house gives it a genuine sense of local character, helping integrate it into this tranquil seaside neighborhood. After a refreshing morning swim in the lengthy pool, relax in the games room or gather in the opulent living room, replete with spacious seating that accommodates large groups of friends or family. The interior water features add an air of tranquility and aquatic atmosphere to the property, and as the afternoon comes on, the scent of delicious local cuisine will gently drift through the property as your local chef ensures you are served nutritious meals during your stay.Just a short walk from Villa Chanjar are the golden expanses of Patong Beach, one of the largest and best-known beaches on the island of Phuket. Guests can sunbathe or swim, or take to the waves for heart-racing jet-skiing and exhilarating boat outings. A huge range of good-time bars and restaurants are just a short walk from the villa, offering live music, karaoke, and energetic bar parties. Further inland, the forested paths of the island hide wildlife sanctuaries and bustling village markets, which are easily accessible via zippy scooter outings. Back at the villa, guests can relax with an amazing bathtub view of the bay, as the soft lights of the shore begin to glow at dusk.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Anar is a stunning beachfront villa on the northwest coast of Koh Samui in Thailand. Situated directly on Laem Noi Beach, the newly-built villa features extraordinary outdoor living areas, exquisite interiors, and five superb king bedroom suites. Taking its name from the Persian word for "pomegranate," as well as from the word for "sun" in the Middle-earth of J.R.R. Tolkien's Lord of the Rings, Villa Anar is exceptional for its sublime sunset views.Enjoy enchanting days luxuriating on elegant loungers in the brilliant sun, or sipping cool drinks in the shade of a breeze-quivered canopy. Dip into in the sparkling waters of your swimming pool and relax in its built-in lounge. Step onto the white sands of your secluded strand of beach and plunge into the turquoise ocean or venture in a kayak onto the glittering expanse. In the afternoon, return for an alfresco barbeque lunch on the terrace.Sliding glass walls open between the pool terrace and the villa's main interior living area, inviting delicious breezes and sublime views into the home. The open-plan space, adjacent to the terrace, creates a lovely space for dinner parties or merely relaxing with family and friends. Savor a fine wine in the living room while beholding the ocean views. Prepare meals in the gourmet kitchen—fully equipped with Küppersbusch appliances and breakfast bar—and gather around the beautiful dining table of teak wood.Each of the five bedroom suites is a luxury beachfront apartment in its own right, with sumptuous king bed, luminous and gorgeous décor, ensuite bathroom, lounge, safe, and doors opening to the pool and terrace. With couple-friendly accommodations for ten, the villa is ideal for destination wedding guests.Villa Anar enjoys an extraordinary location for relishing the beaches, natural beauty, and cultural attractions of Koh Samui. Along with Laem Noi Beach out your door, you're within minutes of several other world-class beaches, including Nathon, Mae Nam, Lipa Noi, and Bophut, and Chaweng. The beachfront dining at Bang Por is within walking distance, and the Four Seasons Hotel is also within easy reach. The town of Nathon is just about six kilometers away. Golfers are minutes from Santiburi Samui Country Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Wake up with the sun at Baan Jakawan, a beautiful vacation rental set on the east coast of Koh Samui. You won’t want to miss a minute of the day at this luxury property near Chaweng, where a full staff is on hand to pamper you and the sea views stretch to the horizon. Spend a blissed-out holiday with up to fourteen friends or family members at this seven-bedroom retreat.Look out over the bay from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool and swim-up bar, a tempting row of loungers in the sun, and partially shaded living and dining areas. In the evenings, relax with the help of satellite television, a DVD player and internet access. Your stay even includes the services of a chef, concierge, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as continental breakfast each day.At the heart of Baan Jakawan is a spacious open-plan great room whose graceful lines are inspired by traditional Thai architecture and whose fold-away glass walls showcase the views. Two sitting areas and a dining table in the center offer plenty of room for everyone to gather together.The villa has four bedrooms with double beds, including the master suite, and three bedrooms with twin beds. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and many have resort-worthy features such as dressing areas, mini fridges or freestanding bathtubs.While Baan Jakawan’s hillside location in the exclusive Narayan Heights neighborhood feels quiet and private, the villa is only a 6 km drive from Chaweng. Here, you’ll find one of the island’s best beaches, where you can relive your honeymoon with a stroll or bring the kids to splash around, and a town with plenty of options for shopping, dining and nightlife. At the beginning and end of your stay, a transfer is provided to the airport 8 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Flanked by towering palm trees, the glistening pool of this top-tier Phuket villa instantly welcomes new arrivals with captivating blue pool and sweeping garden views. Begin the day with a refreshing dip, before taking breakfast in the shaded poolside dining area. Room after room of luxury comfort awaits, while 2 world class beaches plus a profusion of restaurants and bars are just moments away.Glorious Phuket sunshine gently wakes newly-arrived guests at Villa Arteed, with comfortable bedrooms outfitted with subtle Thai decor, rich furnishings and and an abundance of space. Passing through the richly decorated living spaces and artfully-outfitted stairwell, guests can make the most of the massive kitchen, before relaxing on the sumptuous love-seats that pepper the open-air sheltered terrace. As the breeze ruffels the palm fronds that surround the villa, guests can choose to hit the in-house gym, have a blast in the games room, unwind in the villa’s mini spa, or simply dive into the entertainment system in the fully-outfitted TV room.Located on Phuket’s happening western coast, this villa offers fantastic access to some of the very best beaches in Thailand, including Patong Beach and Karon Beach. An impressive range of restaurants, bars and nightclubs are within a few minutes’ drive, while outgoing guests are spoilt for choice with the range of nightlife options that fill the surrounding neighborhoods. Less than 30 minutes drive from the bustling city of Phuket, guests can explore the markets and bustling squares of that island metropolis, as well as the island’s fabled offshore cruises. These include day-trips to the stunning Phi Phi islands, where beautiful beaches are ringed by majestic limestone cliffs. After a day exploring what this lush part of Thailand has to offer, guests can retire to the gently-lit patio for a freshly-made cocktail as the moon shines down on the nearby beaches.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: If you’ve been looking for the beachfront escape of your dreams, simply make the 25 minute drive from the Phuket airport to Coastal Escape. This incredible luxury vacation rental offers an unparalleled location on Natai Beach, stylish and spacious living areas, and impeccable service and amenities. Book the five bedrooms for the ultimate family holiday or a tropical getaway with friends.The villa’s private oceanfront living areas, from sitting and dining areas to an infinity pool and outdoor bar, make it easy to take in the panoramic Andaman Sea views.The clean exterior lines and sliding glass walls lead to gorgeously designed, mod-inspired interiors. An L-shaped great room frames the pool terrace, offering ocean views from the living room, dining room and kitchen. The separate lounge area has the same flair—think plush area rugs, tufted seating and neutral tones peppered with colorful accents—but is a more intimate space for watching TV or using the Wi-Fi.This villa has four bedrooms with king beds, lounge areas, and access to a terrace or balcony: three with ocean views and one with garden views. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and garden views. All five bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms — and the same contemporary take on mid-century style as the great room.Spend your stay indulging in wellness and massage treatments in the villa’s own massage room or reliving your honeymoon with a hand-in-hand stroll along Natai Beach. If you’d like to see more of the area, drive into central Phuket or the nearby Sirinat National Park, ask staff to assist in reserving a tee time at the nearest golf course, or visit one of the three other beaches within day-trip distance.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This incredibly spacious four bedroom is the perfect host for your next beach getaway, corporate retreat, or special social event. Located one kilometer east of Surin’s beautiful beach, Shambala Villa enjoys a scenic ocean view and a prime location. And, even with these luxuries, Shambala doesn’t sacrifice any of its privacy. Nearby, you’ll find golf, shopping, dining, nightlife, and gorgeous beachfront, all within a short drive.Each of Shambala’s spacious bedrooms come with a king sized bed, an en-suite bathroom, and access to the balcony on the top floor. Below, you’ll truly be wowed by the amount of open concept hosting space, all of which merges seamlessly with the pool deck and terrace, where you’ll find even more furnished lounge area. The warm wood color scheme is both welcoming and elegant. After exploring Shambala, it becomes obvious that no expense was spared when decorating the interior with top of the line appliances, electronics, and designer furniture. With its lush property, indoor/outdoor lifestyle, and beautiful Thai architecture, Shamabala shows its guests exactly why Phuket is a premier destination for the most discerning luxury travelers.Shambala Villa features formal and alfresco dining options, as well as a fully equipped kitchen, and a barbecue on the terrace. On hotter days, you’ll appreciate the villa’s air conditioning, or you could head out to the infinity pool to cool off while you enjoy the ocean view. During your stay, you’ll benefit from a staff that includes a housekeeper, security guard, and property manager. And, there is a lengthy list of extra features that can be added, like chef service, a DJ, yacht charters, and more.After you’ve spent an afternoon on the sandy shore of Surin Beach, head down the coast to Phuket’s nightlife capital, Bangla Road, where you’ll find a wide range of dining options and a vast amount of bars, nightclubs, and dancehalls. If you’re in the mood to shop, the Boat Avenue Street Mall is just four kilometers from home. And, if you’re a golfer, the Blue Canyon Course was the stage for one of Tiger Wood’s most astonishing comebacks, defeating Ernie Els in a playoff on the final hole.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience signature Thai hospitality and quintessential Phuket scenery at Baan Banyan. An attentive staff oversees every detail at this luxury vacation rental, and its perch above the treetops over Kamala Beach affords panoramic views of the Andaman Sea. Reserve this six-bedroom residence (of 4 amazing master suites, and 2 more bedrooms with less grandeur) for an unforgettable holiday with friends or a special occasion like a family reunion.During your stay, a chef, property manager, housekeeper and security staff will ensure your comfort. Soak in the tropical sunshine in outdoor living areas featuring an infinity pool; al-fresco spaces for lounging, conversation and dining; and a barbecue. Other amenities range from fitness and entertainment rooms to a wine fridge, sound system and Wi-Fi.Slide-away glass walls connect the outdoor living areas with the indoor ones, so you can enjoy the sea views and warm breezes even while inside. The heart of Baan Banyan is an open-plan great room with sleek sitting and dining areas, a stunning vaulted ceiling and colorful artwork. Though chef service is included in your stay, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar is available.Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has a private en-suite bathroom, a balcony and an ocean view. There are four bedrooms with king beds, al-fresco showers and lounge areas, that are of a standard to rival any honeymoon suite. The other two bedrooms, in the main structure are of a slightly different positioning. They have two twin beds each, which can be combined into king beds on request.Baan Banyan is located in what’s become known as “Millionaire’s Mile,” an exclusive neighborhood that stretches along the headland between Kamala Bay and Patong Beach. While this unparalleled setting is quiet, it’s only a short drive from local attractions such as the sandy arc of Kamala Beach, the dance extravaganzas of FantaSea, the local fare of Talad Kaset Night Market and a range of golf courses.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: An incredible location on Natai Beach, pampering service and design inspired by Russian matryoshka dolls make Iniala Villa Bianca a truly unique retreat. Part of the exclusive Iniala Beach House resort, this Phuket vacation rental is fully staffed and totally private for an atmosphere of contemporary luxury. Share the beautiful, art-filled interiors and three bedrooms with friends or family, or use the whole villa as the setting for a decadent Thailand honeymoon.Your holiday at Iniala Villa Bianca begins with an airport transfer and includes chef and meal service, a butler and driver and even sessions with a spa therapist in the house’s spa and massage room. Two curving halves of the villa, meant to represent hands welcoming guests to Iniala, are split to allow the infinity pool to run from an intimate al-fresco sitting area in the rear courtyard to the sun-drenched, yacht-inspired oceanfront deck in the front. There are lounge chairs for sunbathing, an outdoor shower for rinsing off, a barbecue for trying out local fare or old favorites and an al-fresco dining area where you can linger as the sun sets.Interiors designed by A-cero from Spain and Philosophy of Design from Russia use a monochromatic white color scheme, natural textures, Asian art and the familiar shape of Russian nesting dolls to eclectic yet stunning effect. While walls of cool white and mirror-like glass feel polished and sleek, wood-paneled ceilings and floors are a warm, inviting counterpoint.Each of the three bedrooms at Iniala Villa Bianca has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; two open to the terrace as well. In the two sea-view bedrooms, curving white panels cascade across the ceiling and form the headboard, creating the feeling of being ensconced in a seashell. The sculptural focal point is complemented by lush Thai silks and Indonesian artwork. In the third bedroom, the matryoshka shape makes another appearance in the form of a round bed tucked into a hollowed-out nook. Vibrant artwork by Hahan is a humorous touch that rewards a closer viewing.At the start of your holiday, you can expect a 31 km drive from Phuket International Airport to Iniala Villa Bianca’s setting on Natai Beach in the Nai Thon area. Though there are several other must-see beaches within a short drive, there’s plenty more to do in the area, from crossing the Sa Phan Sarasin bridge and exploring Sirinat National Park and FantaSea to trying out local specialties in Phuket and finding the perfect souvenir at Central Festival Shopping Center. Take a moment to breathe at Wat Chalong Temple or visit Patong for breathtaking views and lively nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.This stunning, single-bedroom villa at Banyan Tree Phuket is perched directly on the resort's lagoon, within walking distance of Laguna Beach and the renowned Laguna Golf Phuket. The private, 1,300-square-meter estate features a fifteen-meter swimming pool on the main terrace and a beautiful wading pool surrounding the master suite pavilion. Its interiors combine classic Thai elegance with contemporary sensibility, including high-end appliances for dining and entertainment. Perfect for a couple on honeymoon or a romantic escape, this vacation rental offers superbly appointed privacy in one of Southeast Asia's most enchanting settings.Nestled amid lush tropical gardens and trees, the terrace welcomes sumptuous relaxation under the clear skies of Phuket's west coast. The main swimming pool extends from the villa toward the lagoon, flanked by comfortable sunbeds. Returning from the beach after sunset, linger outdoors for alfresco meals and cocktails in the dreamy evening breeze.A sliding glass wall infuses the interior great room with a veranda-like ambiance. This ample space features high, vaulted ceilings with a lovely chandelier and ceiling fans above the lounge area and dining table. The décor is exquisite throughout the home, with modern furnishings and sleek lines that feel at once contemporary and steeped in the age-old traditions of Thailand. Air conditioning ensures comfort in all seasons.The master bedroom pavilion is set amid a sublime wading pool, inviting you to step from your bed in the morning into its soothing waters. Glass walls surround the suite on three sides, while shutters provide total privacy when needed. The large ensuite bathroom features a dual vanity, shower, and lovely soaking tub gazing out at the gardens.The villa's fabulous location balances serenity with easy access to the world-class amenities at Banyan Tree Resort. You're a short walk from Laguna Beach, Bang Tao Beach, the fabulous Banyan Tree Spa, and Laguna Golf Phuket—recently redesigned by architect Paul Jansen and named "Asia's Best Golf Course" by World Golf Awards. The villa is also within easy reach of other top destinations on the island, including Naithon Beach and Royal Phuket Marina, while Phuket International Airport is an easy fifteen kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Ayundra is an idyllic beachside retreat located on Koh Samui’s unspoiled west coast in Lipa Noi. On one of the island’s most secluded beaches, Villa Ayundra has been designed to offer guests all the comforts and pleasures of contemporary living along the natural oceanfront setting that personifies this Thai island’s unique appeal. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!This stunning vacation rental looks out to an untroubled bay over a grassy lawn, and steps lead straight to the beach. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the long infinity-edge swimming pool. It’s both perfect for laps and laughs – with the swim-up wet bar. An intelligent use of outdoor space makes island life a pleasure, whether lounging in comfort, dining alfresco in one of the open-sided salas while piping tunes on the outdoor sound system. Interior perks include a wine fridge, an espresso machine, cable television and Wi-Fi. The villa also features an exercise room and baby equipment. The professional staff will take care of the details. Ask about the special meals prepared by a private chef!This secure, walled property features a modern, Thai-influenced design combining natural materials and shingle roofs with the best in contemporary finishes and high-end amenities. Outside, the villa is framed in tropical flora, while inside, the open interiors are beautifully complemented by a fine collection of Asian art and artifacts. With its chic and elegant pavilions, this luxury beachfront villa offers a convenient layout. The innovative, open-walled rooms allow you to wander barefoot between the bedrooms and living areas with ease, while surrounded by sparkling ocean views.Five exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. Each suite offers a king size bed, television, ceiling fan and direct outdoor access. Two suites provide dual vanities, and one includes a rain shower. Villa Ayundra makes a great bet for a family or a special event such as a wedding or birthday.Despite its secluded location, the villa’s sophisticated interiors and entertainment systems mean a carefree holiday. A range of island attractions and golf courses are also within easy reach of Villa Ayundra . Enjoy the spectacular tropical sunsets that are so famous in the southern Thai islands while enjoying your favorite cocktail – have your vacation, your way!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
